tool_description: Classifies inventory items into ABC categories based on sales volume, value, and strategic importance for prioritized inventory management.

warehouse_location.description: Warehouse location to classify inventory for

analysis_period_months.description: Number of months of sales data to analyze (3-24)

value_weight.description: Weight for sales value in classification (0-1)

volume_weight.description: Weight for sales volume in classification (0-1)

class_a_threshold.description: Cumulative percentage threshold for Class A items (0.6-0.9)

class_b_threshold.description: Cumulative percentage threshold for Class B items (0.8-0.95)

error_messages: Invalid warehouse location: The specified warehouse location is not recognized.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_months must be between 3 and 24.
Invalid weight values: value_weight and volume_weight must sum to 1.0.
Invalid threshold values: class_a_threshold must be less than class_b_threshold, both between 0.6 and 0.95.
Insufficient sales data: Not enough sales history for reliable ABC classification.
usage: Provide warehouse_location and optionally adjust analysis_period_months and classification parameters. The tool assigns each product to Class A, B, or C based on Pareto analysis.

class_a_skus.description: SKUs classified as Class A (high value/volume)

class_b_skus.description: SKUs classified as Class B (medium value/volume)

class_c_skus.description: SKUs classified as Class C (low value/volume)
